project.description: CAGE DELETE CANNOT BE UNDONE - YOU WILL LOSE THE DATA ON YOUR MACHINES

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo Deleting customer cage $CustomerCage CUST="$(echo "$CustomerCage" | cut -d ':' -f 1)" CAGE="$(echo "$CustomerCage" | cut -d ':' -f 2)" ssh -F ~/.ssh/config ec2-user@nucleator << ENDSSH PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 nucleator cage delete --customer "$CUST" --cage "$CAGE" ENDSSH
